Chapter 6 Interactive component 6.1 Parallel Coordinates Plot

Chapter 6 Interactive component 6.1 Parallel Coordinates Plot Key: - Click axis label to change color, drag axis label to reorder - Click and drag to select multiple entries - Press Keep to remove all unselected entries from plot - Press Remove to remove selected entries from plot - Press Reset to remove all changes made from Keep and Remove - Hover over entry in grid below plot to highlight entry Code for plot adapted from Parallel Coordinates Examples Keep Remove Reset
